name: Small adventure (checkmatress)
description:
Hello, I'm the game creator of this game, Checkmate.
Welcome to our game page. 
Our game is a text-based adventure game. Unlike other text games, our game is more likely to test your reaction. You not only need to make decisions during the adventure but also need to make the right choice to survive.

There'll be more content to explore in the game. (To see how it goes, please look at our Patreon goal. 

This game is free to play!! (additional content will be a

However...it would be great if there's a bit of support for our team. 

Our team would give all of Thanks to you.

We have our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/checkmatress
No matter what tier you choose(Patreon).
The game is still in progress... might have some bugs in it. If you play this game and found any bugs, feel free to contact our team.

Please follow us for more updates in the future
Have a great adventure~~~
